languages.text: "Они страшатся ее могущества, ибо лишь {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}новатор{/g} может в полной мере постичь таинства Атласа Звездных Путей и покорить его силу! То, что ренегаты считают поводком, мы называем путеводной звездой".

traits.locale_text: "Они страшатся ее могущества, ибо лишь {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}новатор{/g} может в полной мере постичь таинства Атласа Звездных Путей и покорить его силу! То, что ренегаты считают поводком, мы называем путеводной звездой".
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "They dread its power, for only a {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} can fully grasp the mysteries and harness the power of the Starway Atlas! What the renegades call a leash, we call a guiding star."
languages.original_text: "Они страшатся ее могущества, ибо лишь {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}новатор{/g} может в полной мере постичь таинства Атласа Звездных Путей и покорить его силу! То, что ренегаты считают поводком, мы называем путеводной звездой".

traits.locale_text: "They are dreading her power, for only a {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}novator{/g} can fully grasp the mysteries and harness the power of the Starway Atlas! What renegades call a leash we call a guiding star."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "They are dreading her power, for only a {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}novator{/g} can fully grasp the mysteries and harness the power of the Starway Atlas! What renegades call a leash we call a guiding star."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "They dread her power, for only a {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} can fully grasp the mysteries and harness the power of the Starway Atlas! What renegades call a leash, we call a guiding star."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "They dread her power, for only a {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} can fully grasp the mysteries and harness the power of the Starway Atlas! What renegades call a leash, we call a guiding star."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "They dread her power, for only a {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} can fully grasp the mysteries and harness the power of the Starway Atlas! What the renegades call a leash, we call a guiding star."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: “他们惧怕它的力量，因为只有{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}大族长{/g}才能完全掌握群星圣仪的奥秘，利用它的力量！圣仪被那群叛徒称之为枷锁，但在我们眼里，它却是指引前路的星辰。”
languages.original_text: "They dread its power, for only a {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} can fully grasp the mysteries and harness the power of the Starway Atlas! What the renegades call a leash, we call a guiding star."

traits.locale_text: “他们惧怕它的力量，因为只有{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}大族长{/g}才能完全掌握群星圣仪的奥秘，利用它的力量！圣仪被那群叛徒称之为枷锁，但在我们眼里，它却是指引前路的星辰。”
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: «¡Temen su poder, ya que solo una {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} puede comprender plenamente los misterios y dominar el poder del Atlas de las Vías Estelares! Esos renegados llaman una correa a lo que nosotros consideramos nuestra estrella guía».
languages.original_text: "They dread its power, for only a {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} can fully grasp the mysteries and harness the power of the Starway Atlas! What the renegades call a leash, we call a guiding star."

traits.locale_text: «¡Temen su poder, ya que solo una {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} puede comprender plenamente los misterios y dominar el poder del Atlas de las Vías Estelares! Esos renegados llaman una correa a lo que nosotros consideramos nuestra estrella guía».
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: 「スターウェイ・アトラスの謎を完全に把握し、その力を利用できるのは{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}ノベイター{/g}だけだからだ！反逆者が鎖と呼ぶものを、我々は導きの星と呼ぶ」
languages.original_text: "They dread its power, for only a {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} can fully grasp the mysteries and harness the power of the Starway Atlas! What the renegades call a leash, we call a guiding star."

traits.locale_text: 「スターウェイ・アトラスの謎を完全に把握し、その力を利用できるのは{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}ノベイター{/g}だけだからだ！反逆者が鎖と呼ぶものを、我々は導きの星と呼ぶ」
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Sie fürchten seine Macht, denn nur eine {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novatorin{/g} kann die Mysterien des Atlas der Sternenwege vollständig erfassen und seine Macht nutzen! Was für Abtrünnige eine Fessel ist, betrachten wir als Leitstern."
languages.original_text: "They dread its power, for only a {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} can fully grasp the mysteries and harness the power of the Starway Atlas! What the renegades call a leash, we call a guiding star."

traits.locale_text: "Sie fürchten ihre Macht, denn nur eine {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novatorin{/g} kann die Mysterien des Atlas der Sternenwege vollständig erfassen und seine Macht nutzen! Was für Abtrünnige eine Fessel ist, betrachten wir als Leitstern."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: « Ils craignent son pouvoir, car seule une {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} peut comprendre les mystères et maîtriser la puissance de l'Atlas qui nous guide ! Hélas, ces renégats y voient plutôt une laisse qui asservit. »
languages.original_text: "They dread its power, for only a {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} can fully grasp the mysteries and harness the power of the Starway Atlas! What the renegades call a leash, we call a guiding star."

traits.locale_text: « Ils craignent son pouvoir, car seule une {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} peut comprendre les mystères et maîtriser la puissance de l'Atlas qui nous guide ! Hélas, ces renégats y voient plutôt une laisse qui asservit. »
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Onun gücünden korkuyorlar. Yalnızca bir {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Rota Reisi{/g}, Yıldız Yolu Atlası'nın gizemlerini tam olarak kavrayıp onun gücüne hükmedebilir. Hainlerin tasma dedikleri şeyi biz yol gösterici bir yıldız olarak görüyoruz."
languages.original_text: "They dread its power, for only a {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} can fully grasp the mysteries and harness the power of the Starway Atlas! What the renegades call a leash, we call a guiding star."

traits.locale_text: "Onun gücünden korkuyorlar. Yıldız Yolu Atlası'nın gizemlerini tam olarak yalnızca bir {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Rota Reisi{/g} kavrayabilir ve onun gücüne hükmedebilir. Hainlerin tasma dedikleri şeyi biz yol gösterici bir yıldız olarak görüyoruz."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader
